hsuforum.name: Discussion Forum #3 - Debate (Group Collaboration Space)
hsuforum.intro:
Preparing for the debate:

Debate Topic â€“ An evidence informed practice (EIP) approach to the practice of Chinese medicine will improve patient care.

The class will be divided into 3 groups - moderators, affirmative, and negative. Using the online forum, with your designated team members, prepare for the debate to be held in class on week 14.

Moderators will devise the 5 debate questions. These 5 questions will be posted by the beginning of class in week 12. Separate discussions amongst the affirmative and negative teams in relation to formulating responses to these 5 questions must be posted by the beginning of class in week 13.

Each team must appoint designated speakers for each question, and the same person cannot respond to more than one question. The affirmative and negative teams will take it in turns to respond first to each question. The team that responded second is required to respond to both the question and the response from the other team.
